titleInfo.title: Stompin III Bluegrass in the Pines Layout (18041)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing Stompin III Bluegrass in the Pines featuring Larry Stevenson and the New Grass, Jim Orange and the Orange Blossoms, Bluegrass Horizon, Ralph Bailey and the New Grass Express, Gene Harvey and Bluegrass Four, and Jimmy Brown and the News Boys in Charlottesville on September 4. Poster features metal photoplates of Larry Stevenson and the New Grass, Jim Orange, and Bobby Jo Watson. The photoplates for Bobby Jo and Larry Stevenson are flipped. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/48388/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
